definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
abbr. for 柬埔寨[Jian3 pu3 zhai4], Cambodia
to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
to refine (a substance)/to purify/to refine (one's skills, writing etc)/refined/polished/succinct/skilled/capable
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
coking/the process of producing coke from coal

sentences.english: Your intellect is a better instrument of spiritual growth than any religious teachings.
sentences.chinese: 你的聰明才智是比宗教教義更好的心靈脩煉工具。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity of strong man .
sentences.chinese: 烈火試真金，逆境煉壯士。

sentences.english: Wen Jin Li Gou for some, Chihiro Lian white flowers wet days.
sentences.chinese: 一段錦紋離垢地，千尋白煉溼花天。

sentences.english: Lian people, to ride a horse.
Modification of the Bessemer process for converting pig iron into steel.
sentences.chinese: 修正柏塞麥鍊鋼法將生鐵煉成鋼的一種方法。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity of strong man.
sentences.chinese: 烈火煉真金，困境出好漢。

sentences.english: Rehgar has brought in what looks like a twenty-foot orc to test his team.
sentences.chinese: 雷加帶來了一個20英尺左右的獸人來試煉他的步隊。

sentences.english: Storing and preparing all different kinds of foodstuffs and cooking down milk and making ghee.
sentences.chinese: 儲存和準備各種不同種類的食材並蒸發牛奶和煉酥油。

sentences.english: As fire tries gold, so does adversity try virtue.
sentences.chinese: 烈火煉真金，逆境見美德。

sentences.english: The crucible is for silver, and the furnace is for gold, but the Lord tests the heart.
sentences.chinese: 鼎爲煉銀，爐爲鍊金，惟有耶和華熟煉人心。

sentences.english: Fire proves gold, adversity proves men. -- L. A.
sentences.chinese: Seneca烈火煉真金，逆境識真人。

sentences.english: Coal piles on the Zinc mine is like an fairyland for children.
sentences.chinese: 貴州赫章煉鋅礦上的煤堆是孩子們的樂園。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold.
sentences.chinese: 烈火試真金，困難煉壯士。

sentences.english: The fire is the test of gold ; adversity of strong men.
sentences.chinese: 烈火煉真金，逆境煉壯士。

sentences.english: The fire is the test of gold ; adversity of strong men.
sentences.chinese: 烈火煉真金，逆境煉壯士。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity, of strong men.
sentences.chinese: 烈火煉真金，逆境出強人。

definition: (of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
